items.sentence: I\'ve gotten used to doing things my own way.
I\'ve just finished doing my French homework.
If I won the lottery, I\'d buy you a new car.
If Tom didn\'t write this, then who wrote it?
It\'s essential that you eat more vegetables.
It\'s going to take a while to get this done.
It\'s good to try new things once in a while.
Do you stay at Tom\'s when you\'re in Boston?
I think Tom doesn\'t speak French very often.
Do you know why Tom wasn\'t at Mary\'s party?
I thought for sure Tom would be here on time.
I thought it might be too early to visit Tom.
I thought it was a beautiful funeral service.
I thought that Tom was still studying French.
Tom has agreed to babysit our kids on Monday.
Tom has been learning French for three years.
Tom has been looking for his dog all morning.
Tom has gotten a number of letters from Mary.
There isn\'t much difference between the two.
I\'m afraid Tom doesn\'t want to talk to you.
